com.emmes.aps.sync

Class DataSyncRequestReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.emmes.aps.sync.DataSyncRequestReceiver

  • public class DataSyncRequestReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    The Class DataSyncRequestReceiver is a BroadCastReceiver BroadCastReceiver which broadcast while data is sync with the server. Upon receiving the response from the server, this broadcast receiver, process the data sent by the server. The main data here is the location tracking duration data which should be set from the server. This will update the location duration table if anything added to the server.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mahbubur Rahman
    See Also:
    BroadcastReceiver

        Specified by:

      • syncTrackingDuration

        private void syncTrackingDuration(java.util.ArrayList<LocationTrackingDurationFormat> durationList)
        This syncTrackingDuration method is for updating the tracking duration data based on the response from the server. If there any different between server settings of tracking duration with the local table, the locat table is get updated.

        Algorithm:

        • The process first retrieve information from local database about tracking duration.
        • Then it create a HashMap HashMap using the data.
        • The response from the server is compared to the HashMap. So if any new data is there, it will added.
        • Finally the update HashMap is saved to the database tracking duration table.
        Parameters:
        durationList - the list containing the tracking duration data.
        Throws:
        none
        Since:
        1.0

      • statusUpdateToComplete

        public void statusUpdateToComplete()
        This statusUpdateToComplete updates the database table data which were in progress with transferring. If the data successfully transfered, then the status is updated as transfere complete.
        Parameters:
        none -
        Since:
        1.0

      • syncLocalDatabaseWithServerResponse

        private void syncLocalDatabaseWithServerResponse(java.lang.String response)
        This syncLocalDatabaseWithServerResponse method receives the server response. If the response contains success message, then it updated the database as successfully transfered the data to the server otherwise, it does not change the database entry using the method com.emmes.aps.sync.

        This method also receives the response as JSon object of the tracking duration data. It then call the method com.emmes.aps.sync and update the database.

        Parameters:
        response - response from the server.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        Since:
        1.0
